content.c_answer2: Kathy \& Stella Solve a Murder! has a run time of 2 hours and 20 minutes, including an interval. For a 7:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 9:50PM. For a 2:30PM performance, the show will finish at roughly 4:50PM.
content.name: How long is Kathy & Stella Solve a Murder! and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Kathy & Stella Solve a Murder! and when does it finish?
